prompt: Vibrant hot pink solid background. Centered composition, print-ready clean design of isolated artwork only. MUST include: thick black vector-style outline around the isolated elements (text and graphics) ONLY. Do NOT add a square frame or border around the entire image. TEXT Hungarian: "TÜRELEM" (top) "RÓZSÁT TEREM" (below) "NEKEM" (above) "KAKTUSZ" (center large) "JUTOTT" (below). Typography and layout: top line "TÜRELEM" in bold condensed rounded uppercase sans, white fill with heavy thick black vector outline, slightly arched; second line "RÓZSÁT TEREM" in playful chunky bubble type, lime-to-chartreuse green gradient fill with subtle darker-green inner shading, thick black vector outline, slightly larger than the top line and following a gentle arc; the word "NEKEM" small uppercase white rounded sans centered above the main word; main focal word "KAKTUSZ" extremely bold, oversized block type with bright green gradient, subtle rounded bevel highlights, white accent edges, and a very thick black vector-style outline to match the graphic; bottom word "JUTOTT" in bold uppercase white sans, balanced under the main word with matching thick black outline. Graphics: centered cute cartoon round cactus with smiling kawaii face, simple black dot eyes and small curved mouth, two rosy pink cheek blush spots, a single pink flower on top, simplified white-tipped spikes, small brown soil mound under the cactus, and scattered small green triangle confetti/radiant shards around the cactus for energy. All graphic elements use flat vector colors, crisp edges, minimal shading, and the same thick black vector-style outline (outline applied only to text and graphic elements). Composition: tightly integrated text and cactus, harmonious spacing, strong typographic hierarchy with "KAKTUSZ" dominating, balanced margins for a print-ready T-shirt transfer. Explicit: isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows.
